Do you read our blog and courses?Are you looking for guest blogging sites where you can post your guest posts for free in 2021? You’re in the right place. 

Guidelines

We accept guest posts! Here are some guidelines for you to follow before making submission:

  1. There are more chances of approval if you write content on the topic given by us. Please mail us for topics.
  2. The article must be related to Blogging, Vlogging, Keyword Research, SEO, SMO, Backlinks, DA/PA, Digital Marketing, Affiliate Marketing etc.
  3. If we find the content promotional, it will be instantly rejected. You can include your product/idea in the content, but it should be valuable for the users.
  4. Those having agency names (e.g. Digital Marketing Agency in Delhi) as anchor texts will be rejected instantly. Instead, use title of a blog post (of your site) as anchor text.
  5. We reject the article if we find even a single grammatical/spelling mistake.
  6. The article should be more than 80% unique and the language should be easy. Avoid difficult words and jargons. Keep the sentences and paragraphs short.
  7. Include images and proper reference.

How to Submit

You can submit your article to contact@explorekeywords.com. Please send us the title and information about the article first so that we may be able to tell you if the article relates to or not.
